Package com.styra.opa.springboot

package com.styra.opa.springboot
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConstantContextDataProvider
    This helper class allows creating a ContextDataProvider which always returns the same constant value.
    OPAAuthorizationManager
    This class implements a Spring AuthorizationManager which wraps the OPA-Java SDK (https://github.com/StyraInc/opa-java).
    OPAResponse
    This class models the data to be returned from an OPA-SpringBoot policy.
    OPAResponseContext
    This class models the data to be returned from an OPA-SpringBoot policy under the context key.
